text: aur jab unase kaha jaata hai, "allaah ne jo kuchh utaara hai usaka anusaran karo." to kahate hai, "nahin balki ham to usaka anusaran karenge jisapar hamane apane baap-daada ko paaya hai." kya us dasha mein bhee jabaki unake baap-daada kuchh bhee buddhi se kaam na lete rahe hon aur na seedhe maarg par rahe hon
